import React from 'react' import '../App.css' import DataContext from '../Contexts/dataContext' import DataProvider from '../Providers/dataProvider' export default function () { return ( <> {({ isWeightHeight, handleClicked, handleHeight, handleWeight }) =>
handleHeight(e)} id="height" type="number" placeholder="50" min="1" />
handleWeight(e)} type="number" placeholder="160" min="1" />
{isWeightHeight.map((value) => ( ((value.height != null && value.weight != null) || (value.height != 0 && value.weight != 0)) ? < > {console.log(value)} {console.log(value.height)} {console.log(value.weight)}

{value.height}

{value.weight}

: <> {/* {console.log(value)} {console.log(value.height)} {console.log(value.weight)} */} // console.log(value) )) }
} ); }
